descriptionHtml:
--UPDATE 1.02--
Fixed disappearing Whiterun bug

--UPDATE 1.01--
Moved trap door in Breezehome for compatability with Dovahkiin Hideout.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------
THIEVERY - WIP         Towns currently finished-  Whiterun
----------------------

WHAT DOES IT DO?

Thievery makes being a thief much more fun and rewarding. Here\'s how.

-----------------------------------
MORE THINGS TO STEAL
-----------------------------------

- Merchant chests in every shop 
- Money boxes on every shop counter
- A golden artifact in every shop and upper class home
- Loot chests in homes
- Family heirlooms
- Golden artifacts in palaces

---------------------------------
MORE WAYS TO STEAL
----------------------------------

- Most new locks on doors and chests open able with the key from the shop or home they are in
- A complete ratway underneath Whiterun with an entrance up into nearly every home and     establishment, also a small player home inside to store your loot on the go

-Alternate entrances on the roofs of most shops and upper class houses
- A small secret compartment hideout in Breezehome you can access from the roof even before you own the house

---------------------
FUTURE PLANS
---------------------
- Running and jumping along rooftops in the more dense cities
- Palace treasuries
- More pocket loot on npc\'s
I plan on doing something unique for each hold and adding to every other shop and inn in the game. I am open to suggestions and requests so let me know what you think.

Recommended mods
-My own  A Thieves Treasure at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10213
author: mrstiffy
